title: Only For You
lyrics:
jeil joheun oseul goreugo
saero sadun hyangsu ppurigo
yeoyu issneun sigane
gibun johge chulbalhae
na eolma humyeon dochakhal geoya
dallineun cha ane

heureuneun eumage

simjangdo majchwo chumchugo



jigeum neoneun eodinde

cheoncheonhi junbihae

ttak majchwo neoui gyeoteuro

Baby baby I’ll go



Baby baby

sarangseureon maeil soge

gadeukhan seollem seollem

Only for you

hamkke haneun geosmada

hamkke ganeun gosmada

Baby baby baby baby

It’s only for you



ne mamsogeseo na malgon jiwo

han beonppunin unmyeongcheoreom neon naman mideo

sarange puk ppajyeobeorin nal bwa

neul hemaewassdeon dabeul chajeun geot gata



ne yeopui nal bureowohae Everybody

Everybody

neoegen bihal su eopseo Nobody

Nobody

nareul chaeun i neukkimdo

nae simjang tteollimkkaji All for you

That’s right



beonjineun useume

seuchineun hyanggie

meorineun adeukhaejigo

oneulttara simhane

wae geuri yeppeunde

neo ttaeme sumi gappawa

Baby baby I’ll go



Baby baby

sarangseureon maeil soge

gadeukhan seollem seollem

Only for you

hamkke haneun geosmada

hamkke ganeun gosmada

Baby baby baby baby

It’s only for you



naega deo jalhalge

I’m in love

hanabuteo yeolkkaji

nae modeun ge neoui geu nune mame

mame deuldorok



Uh dalkomhage

pyeongbeomhage sijakhan yeonae

Let’s go now

Baby baby I’ll go



Baby baby

sarangseureon maeil soge

gadeukhan seollem seollem

Only for you

hamkke haneun geosmada

hamkke ganeun gosmada

Baby baby baby baby

It’s only for you



Baby baby

sarangseureon maeil soge

gadeukhan seollem seollem

Only for you

hamkke haneun geosmada

hamkke ganeun gosmada

Baby baby baby baby

It’s only for you
